[[inst_lhui_u]]
==== LHUI.U

*Syntax:* lhui.u [SrcL, simm], ->{t, u, Rd}

*Description:* Load unsigned 16-bit halfword from memory.

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_lhui_u.svg[LHUI.U encoding,width=800]

*Group:* LDA/UNSCALED
